RT @taylor_rwilson @SenSanders I live in Canada. I had brain surgery to remove a tumour in 2016. I was in and out of the hospital in 2 days with a bill of $0.00 to pay.

RT @JReevesTaylor @SenSanders I live in Australia - universal health care (Medicare) means we can get a medical diagnosis & treatment for whatever medical problem arises as and when it does at no charge , including subsidised pharmaceuticals - that’s #equality

RT @silouanwinter @SenSanders I live in Germany. I had breast cancer at the age of 35. I got the best possible care at nearly no cost, and it saved my live. My daughter and I even got to see a shrink for free to help us through it. Today, I am healthy, and I continue to raise my daughter, work, and pay taxes.
